docstring.long_description: It offers a more straightforward way to generate signals, with sample rate and the time in seconds as parameters, along with all the parameters in the SINE block.
docstring.short_description: Generate an oscillator signal (a shorthand combination of the SINE and LINSPACE blocks).

parameters.name: sample_rate
parameters.description: The number of samples that are taken in a second.

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: The total amount of time of the signal.

parameters.name: waveform
parameters.description: The waveform type of the wave.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The y axis offset of the function.

parameters.name: phase
parameters.description: The x axis offset of the function.

returns.description:
x: time domain
y: generated signal
